name: Note Taker
details: Great way to create and save notes for to do lists, shopping lists or personal memos. Application deploys on Heroku

name: Workday Planner
details: Schedule tasks for the day and save them or clear the schedule. Timeslot colours update based on the time of day to indicate past or future times

name: Weather Dashboard
details: Easily view the five day weather forecast by searching for a town. Also features a saved list of past searches for quick access.
